alert.note: Alert for Moore (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 1:45PM EDT until July 31 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Moore County in central North Carolina... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 145 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Carthage, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southern Pines, Carthage, Pinehurst, Aberdeen, Whispering Pines, Pinebluff, Robbins, Foxfire, Taylortown and Vass. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
